mapper.insert: insert into tb_permit (pid, tc_app_id, tc_code, tc_name, tc_url, tc_order, tc_type) values (#{m.pid}0, #{m.tc_app_id}null, #{m.tc_code}, #{m.tc_name}, #{m.tc_url}, #{m.tc_order}, #{m.tc_type})
mapper.update: update tb_permit set pid = #{m.pid}0, tc_app_id = #{m.tc_app_id}null, tc_code = #{m.tc_code}, tc_name = #{m.tc_name}, tc_url = #{m.tc_url}, tc_order = #{m.tc_order}, tc_type = #{m.tc_type} where id = #{m.id}
mapper.sql: t.id, t.pid, t.tc_app_id, t.tc_code, t.tc_name, t.tc_url, t.tc_order, t.tc_type, case t.tc_type when 0 then '应用' when 1 then '菜单' when 2 then '按钮' when 3 then '请求' else '其他' end as tc_type_name, concat(t.tc_name, ' [', case t.tc_type when 0 then '应用' when 1 then '菜单' when 2 then '按钮' when 3 then '请求' else '其他' end, ']') as tc_name2
mapper.select: select , tt.tc_name tc_p_name, t2.tc_name tc_app_name from tb_permit t left join tb_permit tt on t.pid = tt.id left join tb_app t2 on t.tc_app_id = t2.id where t.id = #{id}
select , tt.tc_name tc_p_name, t2.tc_name tc_app_name from tb_permit t left join tb_permit tt on t.pid = tt.id left join tb_app t2 on t.tc_app_id = t2.id order by t.tc_order
select count(1) from tb_permit t left join tb_permit tt on t.pid = tt.id left join tb_app t2 on t.tc_app_id = t2.id
select from tb_permit t inner join tb_role_permit_rs t1 on t.id = t1.tc_permit_id and t1.tc_role_id=#{tc_role_id};

select from tb_permit t inner join tb_role_permit_rs t1 on t.id=t1.tc_permit_id and t.tc_type=2 inner join tb_user_role_rs t2 on t1.tc_role_id=t2.tc_role_id and t2.tc_user_id=#{tc_user_id} group by t.id order by t.tc_order
